title: Bug 18705 - Excessive flashing in Control Example
description: The control example is experiencing excessive flashing. This bug report aims to understand the source of the issue.
OB: The control example exhibits frequent flashing and flickering during operation.
EB: The expected behavior is for only the bottom edge of the outermost frames to require repainting, minimizing the occurrence of flashing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the control example. 2. Interact with the various controls and observe the flashing. 3. Note the excessive flashing throughout the application.
